p: In order to determine which heat wave definition is the best to capture the effects on non-accidental mortality in Wuhan, we developed 45 heat wave definitions combining temperature indicators (mean temperature, maximum temperature, and minimum temperature), temperature thresholds [ 8, 10, 19] (90.0th, 92.5th, 95th, 97.5th, and 99.0th percentile of daily mean/maximum/minimum temperature during 2003–2010) with duration of ≥2, ≥3, and ≥4 days.
